alert.note: Alert for Collin; Cooke; Grayson (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued April 02 at 6:56PM CDT until April 02 at 7:45PM CDT by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 745 PM CDT FOR NORTHEASTERN DENTON...NORTHWESTERN COLLIN...SOUTHEASTERN COOKE AND SOUTHERN GRAYSON COUNTIES... At 656 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Ray Roberts Park Isle Du Bois, or near Sanger, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... McKinney, Frisco, Denton, Allen, Sherman, Sanger, Whitesboro, Prosper, Anna, Celina, Melissa, Pilot Point, Van Alstyne, Howe, Aubrey, Krugerville, Collinsville, Whitewright, Cross Roads and Gunter. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1100 PM CDT for north central Texas.
